review: highly recommended for those of us who grew up on the classic adventure games of the 80s and 90s and also for newcomers to the genre whore looking for something different ron gilberts humour is always guaranteed to get at least a couple of chuckles out of you and the amount of detail and love that was put into this project can be easily noticed in the quality of the graphics audio and depth of the game

unfortunately i cant recommend this played in hard mode game starts off slow but around the 3 hour mark i was having fun with the game mechanics and puzzles however it started to taper off around the halfway point puzzles while still clever and logical start to become less enjoyable and wear out their welcome the story doesnt fare well either  all in all a real shame it couldnt stick the landing

for all those 90s kids who remember the good old days of the great 2d lucasarts point and click games this is the game for you designed and written by ron gilbert and gary winnick they bring those classic trademark point and click look feel and jokes to this and wrap it up in a xfiles plot from beginning to end this is an amazing return to form with a great dose of nostalgia that had me playing all those classic point and click games after finishing this
a great game and very nostalgic when it comes to day of the tentacle and maniac mansion really hoping for more of both franchises
i really liked thimbleweed park nice pixel art good voice acting enjoyable gameplay and a really fascinating story

this game sated my desire to have a grownup point and click adventure game truly a unique and wellthought out story i highly recommend this game for those who grew up playing spy fox nancy drew etc you will not regret it
good story fun characters love this game 3

this is a very charming dark pointandclick adventure with lots and lots of retro feel the story is interesting even if it does feel disjointed there are moments where i had a good chuckle and others where i was simply left wondering what the heck if you are a fan of retro point and clicks 8 bit adventures and stories that feel a bit twinpeaksadjacent pick this up when it is on sale
fun times just like the good old days there was only one puzzle that we didnt like the rest made sense with the story recommended
i am playing on the difficult level and the story line is really well done i get stuck at times but thats the point i set the game down and then come back to it i have really enjoyed this game so far

pros  well written game with good voice acting           plenty of in jokes and references to classic adventure games           loaded with humorareno cons  pixel graphics  its intentional nostalgia but unnecessary and not my personal taste           forgettable characters  this game never goes deeper than the basic surface humor           routine plot  the dialogue and humor are great but the plot is a fairly standard tree to hang its tropes on             610  a boo
from a point and click fan i cannot recommend this game enough go play
i loved it

super fun  was looking for a nostalgic hit to remind me of the games i played in the 90s like sam and max and day of the tentacle  this was exactly it played in hard mode which at times very much lived up to its name but was challenging in a good way
i loved this
90s lucasarts point and clicks are some of my favorite games of all time  this definitely reminds me of the formula that made those so successful  this is an excellent game with great voice acting

what a beautiful game best ron gilbert ever and that says it all the old school graphics made me hesitant  and im still not convinced that moder graphics would not have made the game even better but who cares the scenario is fantastic the humor is fantastic the gemaplay is fantastic  if you love adventure games and beautiful stories you want to play this game
so so so good get it now great story recommend to anyone

i really enjoyed this game the puzzles were fun you could play multiple characters with a variety of dialogue options and the ending had a fun twist the two different modes increases replay value as well

yes the good old days every minute of playing reminded me of the hours of puzzling with the classics this game is once again a real gem and is in no way inferior to the old games the characters are so different and entertaining that it never gets boring the puzzles are varied and fun a very successful game
great game buy it
ransome say funny word
extra fun
the puzzles could need some fine tuning here an there but the humor of this game is peak perfomance there arent many point and click games any more but this one can challenge the old ones
an amazing adventure game i have played it 3 times i believe every adventure gamer will love it

i loved this game it was very challenging and had lots of silly puzzles i am still working on getting all achievements i went to the trouble of turning all lights tvs radios and lights on in the hotel fyi that is not an achievement hahaha
love day of the tentacle or the secret of monkey island games then this game is right up your alley great point and click adventure from the greatest point and click adventure minds a gem

i wish there were more of these games i loved maniac mansion and day of the tentacle and this game had a similar vibe going humorous nostalgic fun and reminds me of the old lucas films games if that sounds like your thing give this game a try

id call this a love letter to point and click games but i feel like id be doing a disservice to the game sure it has a ton of references which you can turn off if youre a square but the puzzle design feel leagues ahead of the games of the 90s i cant think of a single puzzle where the solution was some moon logic bullshit a great time would recommend
just perfect for anyone that loves the old style point and click advantures
only freaks like this game
the writing is brilliant and the game is pretty fun not my normal thing but really glad to have played it so far recommend
i love it
hard but enjoyable

nice meta game with a good amount of silliness and classic pointandclick references
funny clever and addicting to play buy this

truly a masterpiece love for the genre and history
1010 if you like point and clicks awesome art amazing story and murder

awesome game

head a great time love the soundtrack the signals were very strong

a blast from the past

sometimes hard but still a great adventure game

one of my favorite pointandclicks from the people who defined the genre back in the golden age goes a lot of places you wont expect special mention for that awesome spacey guitar song in the soundtrack

great adventure game nice art excellent story with reasonably good dad jokes throughout and some really interesting characters still suffers from some unbelievably obtuse puzzles even in casual mode but the hint line really helps keep me from getting too frustrated and gives just as much direction as i need without spoiling anything definitely worth your time if youre a fan of old school adventure games
i really enjoyed the 90s feel of the game but the story stuck with me i thought it was such a blast to see how things ended ive finished this one three times so far and enjoyed it each time
i think the ending was a bit disappointing but except for that i think the journey there was very good and in the spirit of old lucasarts titles definitely one to play
1010 no comments all flawless just install the bleeping game already

what a fantastic game this was i absolutely loved the puzzles and the story was so much fun the characters were easy to get to know but there was always something mysterious going on with them that you never quite find out until much later in the game very well written and utterly enjoyable i miss mm and mi so much i wish there were more games of this genre being made ive played so many over they years and theyre my absolute favourites
a fun point and click mystery with pixel graphics

that a great game  really fun great throw back top the old adventure games no glitches or crashes i love the hint system and how all of the five playable characters have to do something in order to win humor was amazing and the ending was great look forward to playing it again no complaints
i love these oldfashioned pixel quests it makes me feel young again
what a great adventure game from the best of them  even compared to older gems some love was put into making this and this should be enough for anything
a nice adventure and when you are stuck theres a clever hint system to get you going without frustrations
yes

a few more hints on hard mode would be good but overall great funny wellanimated adventure
great game

you know how some games feel like they represent a certain music genre without directly having that genre in its soundtrack  like sometimes youll be playing a game and youll think to yourself yeah this game is punk or this game is hiphop    thimbleweed park is midwest emo  the whole time i was playing this game i was expecting american football or title fight to just start blaring through my speakers
